extendedInfo.description: This application lets you know the meaning of about 30,000 names in different countries. You will also discover the origin of the name and scroll through an alphabetical list or random names! Particularly suitable for those who have not yet decided on the name of your child.You can save your favorite names, and publish the meaning of the names on FaceBook!The application is still in beta: please contact me to request new features and report any bugs or missing names

reviews.title: Poorly designed garbage
reviews.comment: Literally, the worst app I\'ve ever downloaded. I spent 90% of my time looking at our trying to close apps. The information on some names is ok, but if you look up Lauren/Loreen/Lorene for example, every article refers to another article and none of them actually tell you anything. Waste of your time!
reviews.author: Pouya Ameli

reviews.title: Too many adds
reviews.comment: Every time I scrolled down an add popped up its so annoying
reviews.author: Tatiana Washington

reviews.comment: I love this app, but I wish it showed how to  pronounce the names.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not my name!
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I find my japanese name, Hikaru? I seriously need to know. I\'ll just uninstall this and install it back when you\'ve got Japanese serch.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad. Downright bad
reviews.comment: Awful. I can\'t find any name properly because everytime I try to scroll down or pick a name, some advert, B booking thing comes up. Annoying. Also, my name is popular where I\'m from and its nowhere to be seen.
reviews.author: Tara Breslin

reviews.title: Stupid app
reviews.comment: Every time I open the app, then I press on a button, then a advertisement comes up. Hambug!
reviews.author: saleem saeed

reviews.title: Ad filled garbage
reviews.comment: Impossible to see any info. Every second a new pop up, full screen ad comes up.
reviews.author: Andrew Cooper

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t have my name but it has some interesting names
reviews.author: A Google User
